  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(int size)
      Constructs a Board object with the specified size and percentage of special squares.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the board, indicating the dimensions.
      percentageEspecialSquares - The percentage of special squares on the board.

  • Method Details

    • setEspecialPercentageSquares

      public void setEspecialPercentageSquares(int especialPercentageSquares)
      Sets the percentage of special squares on the board based on the specified special percentage. Special squares are randomly placed on the board while considering the provided percentage.
      Parameters:
      especialPercentageSquares - The percentage of special squares to be placed on the board.

    • playToken

      public void playToken(Token token, int row, int column) throws GomokuException
      Plays the specified token at the given row and column on the board.
      Parameters:
      token - The token to be played on the board.
      row - The row where the token will be played.
      column - The column where the token will be played.
      Throws:
      GomokuException

    • setToken

      public void setToken(Token token, int row, int column) throws GomokuException
      Sets the specified token at the given row and column on the board.
      Parameters:
      token - The token to be set on the board.
      row - The row where the token will be set.
      column - The column where the token will be set.
      Throws:
      GomokuException

    • getTokenColor

      public Color getTokenColor(int row, int column)
      Retrieves the color of the token at the specified row and column on the board.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate of the token.
      column - The column coordinate of the token.
      Returns:
      The color of the token, or null if the coordinates are invalid.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Retrieves the size of the board, indicating its dimensions.
      Returns:
      The size of the board.

    • validate

      public boolean validate(int row, int column)
      Validates whether the move at the specified row and column results in a winning condition. Checks for diagonal, vertical, and horizontal winning moves.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate of the last move.
      column - The column coordinate of the last move.
      Returns:
      True if the move results in a winning condition, false otherwise.

    • verify

      public boolean verify(int r, int c)
      Verifies if the specified row and column coordinates are within the valid bounds of the board.
      Parameters:
      r - The row coordinate.
      c - The column coordinate.
      Returns:
      True if the coordinates are valid, false otherwise.

    • getSquare

      public Square getSquare(int i, int j)
      Retrieves the Square object at the specified row and column coordinates on the board.
      Parameters:
      i - The row coordinate of the Square.
      j - The column coordinate of the Square.
      Returns:
      The Square object at the specified coordinates.

    • increaseTurn

      public void increaseTurn()
      Increases the turn count in the associated Game instance.

    • decreaseTurn

      public void decreaseTurn()
      Decreases the turn count in the associated Game instance.

    • increasePlayerQuantity

      public void increasePlayerQuantity(String name, int i)
      Increases the quantity of a specific player's tokens in the associated Game instance.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player.
      i - The quantity to increase.

    • getTurn

      public int getTurn()
      Retrieves the current turn count from the associated Game instance.
      Returns:
      The current turn count.

      Sets the associated Game instance for this Gomoku object.
